# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its category. With its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, it's designed to exceed your expectations. For a limited time, I'm offering this exceptional item to you at an exclusive price of $150. Don't miss out on this opportunity to experience the benefits firsthand. Let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
